120642.予期せぬエラーにより\n動作を完了することが できませんでした。:
Unable to complete the operation due to an
unexpected error.

120646.どうぐかばんが いっぱいのため\n<%sL_ITEM>は 取りだせなかった。:
Couldn't take out the <%sL_ITEM>
because your item bag is full.

120647.家具＆庭具おきばに これ以上\n<%sL_ITEM>は しまえません。: You can't store any more items here.

120648.家具や庭具 家キットを しまったり\n取りだすことができます。\nどうしますか？:
You can store furniture and house kits here.
Do what?
<select_se_off>
Store
Retrieve
<select_end><break>

120649.家具や庭具 家キットを しまったり\n取りだすことができます。\nどうしますか？:
Furniture and house kits can be stored and
retrieved from here.
Do what?
<select_se_off 2>
Store
Retrieve
<select_end><break>

122463.各家の 扉メニューに 家具と庭具を\n３００種類まで 収納できる\n『家具＆庭具:
"Furniture storage" has been installed in the door menu of each house to store up to 300 types of furniture and garden furniture.
Furniture, garden furniture and house kits are the only items that can be stored and accessed from the garden or from inside the house.
Dress-Up Dolls and trophies with rankings cannot be stored. Furniture, garden furniture and house kits are limited to a maximum of 99
pieces of each type, and no more than 100 pieces of the same type may be stored.

122505.家具＆庭具おきばには 一種につき\n９９個までしか 収納することが できません。:
Furniture storage can only hold up to 99
of each type of furniture.
